Package net.minestom.server.thread

Class ThreadDispatcher

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.thread.ThreadDispatcher
public final class ThreadDispatcher extends Object
Used to link chunks into multiple groups. Then executed into a thread pool.

    • of

      @NotNull public static @NotNull ThreadDispatcher of(@NotNull @NotNull ThreadProvider provider, int threadCount)

    • singleThread

      @NotNull public static @NotNull ThreadDispatcher singleThread()

    • getRefreshPercentage

      public float getRefreshPercentage()
      Represents the maximum percentage of tick time that can be spent refreshing chunks thread.

      Percentage based on MinecraftServer.TICK_MS.

      Returns:
      the refresh percentage

    • getMinimumRefreshTime

      public int getMinimumRefreshTime()
      Minimum time used to refresh chunks and entities thread.
      Returns:
      the minimum refresh time in milliseconds

    • getMaximumRefreshTime

      public int getMaximumRefreshTime()
      Maximum time used to refresh chunks and entities thread.
      Returns:
      the maximum refresh time in milliseconds

    • updateAndAwait

      public void updateAndAwait(long time)
      Prepares the update by creating the TickThread tasks.
      Parameters:
      time - the tick time in milliseconds

    • refreshThreads

      public void refreshThreads(long tickTime)
      Called at the end of each tick to clear removed entities, refresh the chunk linked to an entity, and chunk threads based on ThreadProvider.findThread(Chunk).
      Parameters:
      tickTime - the duration of the tick in ms, used to ensure that the refresh does not take more time than the tick itself

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Shutdowns all the tick threads.

      Action is irreversible.

    • onInstanceCreate

      public void onInstanceCreate(@NotNull @NotNull Instance instance)
